channel.title: Mills Family Resources on M. E. Mills
channel.description: Recent content in Mills Family Resources on M. E. Mills

item.title: The Mills of Buffalo
item.description: This section introduces descendants of Timothy Mills that lived in Buffalo NY in the 1800’s, notably, Jonas Davis Mill’s aunt and uncle, who overlap with the time Edward Mills’ family was living in Corfu NY, a short distance from Buffalo. Included are currently unidentified portraits from the Mills Family archive at Queens Library.
